name: Airplane Car Fardel Cargo: Truckage Transporter
name_original: Airplane Car Fardel Cargo: Truckage Transporter
description:
Hold up your seats belts and Play the best Cargo shipping truck simulation game of 2017.
Feel you like a truck driver and make ensure cargo delivery at time in this truck driver 3d simulation. Cargo shipping truck simulation that entertains people with crash because he is dumb and tap on speed paddle on 3d cargo delivery. We have added a very amazing camera view option in this game Switch camera mode to see interior. That is adjustable camera view. The user can set camera angle at any place while the truck is running Cross every hurdle by amazing driving skills & by pressing level paddle. Be the best mechanic of the entire city. We can add beautiful sceneries for user to enjoy by selecting left or right truck side view drive.
